duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional in-office patient experience, patient intake, schedule management, billing and insurance knowledge.
Perform front-of-house duties including check-in/check-out, insurance verification, prepping tests, and maintaining service level expectations.
Contribute to team development, attend team huddles, support in-office providers, and master technology suite.
Perform daily office upkeep, maintain the look and feel of patient and employee-facing spaces, and restock supplies.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year of experience in high-touch customer or patient-facing roles with strong written and verbal communication skills in English
